content: **a lovely bookmark with a wavy stitch pattern and lace stitches ** > **use code get1off at checkout for $1 off a pattern purchase ** **size ** 8 25 x 1 375 / 21 x 3 5 cm **stitches & techniques used ** chains slip_stitch single_crochet extended single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet **yarn ** 25 yards of #3 dk weight lion brand 24/7 cotton sparkle dk or we crochet/knit picks animation dk or suitable substitute **tools ** us size c/2 2 75 mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors optional for stiffening small bowl warm water glue **other ** **read through all of the pattern notes before beginning** and please contact me if you ever have any questions about one of my patterns follow me on instagram @simplyhookedbyjanet join my facebook community and connect with other crochet enthusiasts https //www facebook com/groups/simplyhookedbyjanet copyright protected you may not redistribute pattern after purchase or publish any part as your own including photos you may sell finished products and if possible reference back to this pattern and/or give credit to simply hooked by janet as the original designer
